Explanation: For how long, measuring from AOI entry to exist, did gaze remain inside the AOI? (Holmqvist 2010, Page 520)
How many fixations occured from AOI entry to exist?
How many saccades occured from AOI entry to exist?
How many fixations landed over the stimulus or over a particular area of interest? (Holmqvist 2010, Page 533)
The total duration of the fixations inside an AOI or over the entire stimulus (Tobii Pro Lab, User Manual, V1.194, Page 192)
The average duration of the fixations inside an AOI or over the entire stimulus (Tobii Pro Lab, User Manual, V1.194, Page 192)
The time it takes the participant to make a first fixation on an AOI
How many saccades occured over the stimulus or over a particular area of interest? (Holmqvist 2010, Page 533)
The total duration of the saccades inside an AOI or over the entire stimulus (Saccade duration: Holmqvist 2010, Page 533)
The average duration of the saccades inside an AOI or over the entire stimulus (Saccade duration: Holmqvist 2010, Page 533)
The total distance traversed by saccades inside an AOI or over the entire stimulus (Saccade amplitude: Holmqvist 2010, Page 420)
The average distance traversed by saccades inside an AOI or over the entire stimulus (Saccade amplitude: Holmqvist 2010, Page 420)
The average peak velocity of the saccades occured inside an AOI or over the entire stimulus (Saccadic Velocity: Holmqvist 2010, Page 440)
Over the whole trial, how much time was spent in an AOI? (Holmqvist 2010, Page 524)
How much time was spent in an AOI in average?
Over the whole trial, how many times was an AOI visited? (Holmqvist 2010, Page 561)

Measure: Average Number of Fixations in Dwell
Explanation: The average number of fixations per AOI visit

Measure: Average Number of Saccades in Dwell
Explanation: The average number of saccades per AOI visit
